verses.verse: Therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> we <WG2248> ought <WG1163> <WG5748> to give the more earnest <WG4056> heed <WG4337> <WG5721> to the things which we have heard <WG191> <WG5685>, lest at any time <WG3379> we should let them slip <WG3901> <WG5632>.

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> the word <WG3056> spoken <WG2980> <WG5685> by <WG1223> angels <WG32> was <WG1096> <WG5633> stedfast <WG949>, and <WG2532> every <WG3956> transgression <WG3847> and <WG2532> dis`Ovedience <WG3876> received <WG2983> <WG5627> a just <WG1738> recompence of reward <WG3405>;

How <WG4459> shall we <WG2249> escape <WG1628> <WG5695>, if we neglect <WG272> <WG5660> so great <WG5082> salvation <WG4991>; which <WG3748> at the first <WG746> began <WG2983> <WG5631> to be spoken <WG2980> <WG5745> by <WG1223> the YY <WG2962>, and was confirmed <WG950> <WG5681> unto <WG1519> us <WG2248> by <WG5259> them that heard <WG191> <WG5660> him;

'Elohim <WG2316> also bearing them witness <WG4901> <WG5723>, both <WG5037> with signs <WG4592> and <WG2532> wonders <WG5059>, and <WG2532> with divers <WG4164> miracles <WG1411>, and <WG2532> gifts <WG3311> of the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151>, according to <WG2596> his own <WG846> will <WG2308>?

For <WG1063> unto the angels <WG32> hath he <WG5293> not <WG3756> put in subjection <WG5293> <WG5656> the world <WG3625> to come <WG3195> <WG5723>, whereof <WG4012> <WG3739> we speak <WG2980> <WG5719>.

But <WG1161> one <WG5100> in a certain place <WG4225> testified <WG1263> <WG5662>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, What <WG5101> is <WG2076> <WG5748> man <WG444>, that <WG3754> thou art mindful <WG3403> <WG5736> of him <WG846>? or <WG2228> the son <WG5207> of man <WG444>, that <WG3754> thou visitest <WG1980> <WG5736> him <WG846>?

Thou madest <WG1642> him <WG846> a little <WG1024> <WG5100> lower <WG1642> <WG5656> than <WG3844> the angels <WG32>; thou crownedst <WG4737> <WG5656> him <WG846> with glory <WG1391> and <WG2532> honour <WG5092>, and <WG2532> didst set <WG2525> <WG5656> him <WG846> over <WG1909> the works <WG2041> of thy <WG4675> hands <WG5495>:

Thou hast put <WG5293> all things <WG3956> in subjection <WG5293> <WG5656> under <WG5270> his <WG846> feet <WG4228>. For <WG1063> in <WG1722> that he put <WG5293> all <WG3956> in subjection under <WG5293> <WG5658> him <WG846>, he left <WG863> <WG5656> nothing that is not <WG3762> put under <WG506> him <WG846>. But <WG1161> now <WG3568> we see <WG3708> <WG5719> not yet <WG3768> all things <WG3956> put under <WG5293> <WG5772> him <WG846>.

But <WG1161> we see <WG991> <WG5719> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>, who <WG3588> was made <WG1642> a little <WG1024> <WG5100> lower <WG1642> <WG5772> than <WG3844> the angels <WG32> for <WG1223> the suffering <WG3804> of death <WG2288>, crowned <WG4737> <WG5772> with glory <WG1391> and <WG2532> honour <WG5092>; that <WG3704> he <WG1089> by the grace <WG5485> of 'Elohim <WG2316> should taste <WG1089> <WG5667> death <WG2288> for <WG5228> every man <WG3956>.

For <WG1063> it became <WG4241> <WG5707> him <WG846>, for <WG1223> whom <WG3739> are all things <WG3956>, and <WG2532> by <WG1223> whom <WG3739> are all things <WG3956>, in bringing <WG71> <WG5631> many <WG4183> sons <WG5207> unto <WG1519> glory <WG1391>, to make <WG5048> the captain <WG747> of their <WG846> salvation <WG4991> perfect <WG5048> <WG5658> through <WG1223> sufferings <WG3804>.

For <WG1063> both <WG5037> he that sanctifieth <WG37> <WG5723> and <WG2532> they who are sanctified <WG37> <WG5746> are all <WG3956> of <WG1537> one <WG1520>: for <WG1223> which <WG3739> cause <WG156> he is <WG1870> not <WG3756> ashamed <WG1870> <WG5736> to call <WG2564> <WG5721> them <WG846> brethren <WG80>,

Saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, I will declare <WG518> <WG5692> thy <WG4675> name <WG3686> unto my <WG3450> brethren <WG80>, in <WG1722> the midst <WG3319> of the Congregation <WG1577> will I sing praise <WG5214> <WG5692> unto thee <WG4571>.

And <WG2532> again <WG3825>, I <WG1473> will <WG2071> <WG5704> put my trust <WG3982> <WG5756> in <WG1909> him <WG846>. And <WG2532> again <WG3825>, Behold <WG2400> <WG5628> I <WG1473> and <WG2532> the children <WG3813> which <WG3739> 'Elohim <WG2316> hath given <WG1325> <WG5656> me <WG3427>.

Forasmuch <WG1893> then <WG3767> as the children <WG3813> are partakers <WG2841> <WG5758> of flesh <WG4561> and <WG2532> blood <WG129>, he <WG3348> also <WG2532> himself <WG846> likewise <WG3898> took part <WG3348> <WG5627> of the same <WG846>; that <WG2443> through <WG1223> death <WG2288> he might destroy <WG2673> <WG5661> him that had <WG2192> <WG5723> the power <WG2904> of death <WG2288>, that is <WG5123> <WG5748>, the devil <WG1228>;

And <WG2532> deliver <WG525> <WG5661> them <WG5128> who <WG3745> through <WG1223> fear <WG5401> of death <WG2288> were <WG2258> <WG5713> all <WG3956> their lifetime <WG2198> <WG5721> subject <WG1777> to bondage <WG1397>.
For <WG1063> verily <WG1222> he took <WG1949> not <WG3756> on <WG1949> <WG5736> him the nature of angels <WG32>; but <WG235> he took on <WG1949> <WG5736> him the seed <WG4690> of Avraham <WG11>.

Wherefore <WG3606> in <WG2596> all things <WG3956> it behoved him <WG3784> <WG5707> to be made like <WG3666> <WG5683> unto his brethren <WG80>, that <WG2443> he might be <WG1096> <WG5638> a merciful <WG1655> and <WG2532> faithful <WG4103> Kohen HaGodol <WG749> in things pertaining to <WG4314> 'Elohim <WG2316>, to <WG1519> make reconciliation for <WG2433> <WG5745> the sins <WG266> of the people <WG2992>.

For <WG1063> in <WG1722> that <WG3739> he <WG3958> himself <WG846> hath suffered <WG3958> <WG5754> being tempted <WG3985> <WG5685>, he is able <WG1410> <WG5736> to succour <WG997> <WG5658> them that are tempted <WG3985> <WG5746>.
